授業の概要・背景: Ethnography is the systematic study of peoples and culture including language. The student observes culture from the perspective of the subject of the study. Students will learn qualitative research methods that are used in ethnography but also in the other social sciences such as anthropology, sociology, and psychology. Language is difficult to separate from the culture it comes from so studying culture can help understand target languages. Although this topic sounds very academic it is also very social and cultural and so most students find the study enjoyable. The research methods introduced will be useful in many disciplines regardless of language.
授業方法:
For AY 2022/2023 the plan is to teach face-to-face in the classroom with precautions to prevent the spread of covid. However, if the covid situation worsens there is a possibility that classes may be moved to partially or wholly online. The teacher will update you at that time in detail if that happens but in general classes would use Zoom, Luna, and other online tools.

There will be some short lecture style sessions but these will always be followed up with pair and small group work for discussion.
